DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Healthy volunteer ( ≥11 year ) schedule bracket removal ≥ 1 WSL modify score 1 2 ( Gorelick et al . 1982 ) UFT debonding Known hypersensitivity allergy study product standard toothpaste ingredient and/or dental material use present study Known hypersensitivity allergy placebo gel ingredient Alterations teeth 's enamel , e.g . hypoplasia , fluorosis Any illness/condition potentially affect study outcome investigator 's discretion Known pregnancy breast feed course study
